means: 占卜写板（迷信活动用的一种道具）

sentence.Network_en: The witch doctor is practicing planchette writing to tell one's fortune.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位巫医正在扶乩问卜.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 灵应盘可以分为两个部份，底盘、以及乩板（planchette）。底盘的型制多数为印制上字母、数字，以及Yes、No字样的木质方板。
plancheite 纤硅铜矿planchette 绘图板plane deformation 平面变形
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译英语词汇网 -... ... planchet 造币金属板 planchette 占卜写板 plane 平面.

list.abs: Planavin 磺乐灵planchette paper 币坯纸plane cutting tool 平面刀具

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French, literally small plank', diminutive of planche

means.word_mean: 1. a triangular board supported on casters; when lightly touched with the fingertips it is supposed to spell out supernatural (or unconscious) messages
